class.name: TournamentSelection

javadoc.text: Tournament selection scheme. Each of the two selected chromosomes is selected * based on n-ary tournament -- this is done by drawing {@link #arity} random * chromosomes without replacement from the population, and then selecting the * fittest chromosome among them.
number of chromosomes included in the tournament selections

javadoc.param: arity how many chromosomes will be drawn to the tournament

javadoc.text: Select two chromosomes from the population. Each of the two selected * chromosomes is selected based on n-ary tournament -- this is done by * drawing {@link #arity} random chromosomes without replacement from the * population, and then selecting the fittest chromosome among them.
javadoc.param: population the population from which the chromosomes are chosen.
javadoc.throws: MathIllegalArgumentException if the tournament arity is bigger than the population size

javadoc.text: Helper for {@link #select(Population)}. Draw {@link #arity} random chromosomes without replacement from the * population, and then select the fittest chromosome among them.
javadoc.param: population the population from which the chromosomes are choosen.
